summary: An ENB Palette that adds red-tones to enhance your game and makes it look amazing (:
descriptionHtml:
This is an enb Palette that I use with Ultra Performance ENB- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41180/?
Now tested with Gameplay Performance ENB (see screenshots)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53100/?
If you want it to look like the screenshots then use either enb but you can use it with any other if you have a preferred one.

Feel free to download the Alpha or the Beta (alpha not tested on GP-ENB) my ini file is not required so you can use one you already have it's just there for your game to look like the Beta Screenshots

WARNING:
There is one glitch i cannot fix at the moment as Markarth looks a bit too bright (It's nothing serious i just don't like it, could just be me though), please tell me if you are having this issue and know how to fix it so i can update the mod

INSTALLATION:
Drop the palette into your skyrim folder, not the data folder. You must have an ENB installed for this to work!

Please Read:
This is a work in progress and the first time i have ever tried to create a mod suggestions are much preciated and i take them all into account.
I will try and expand this into its own ENB in the future so keep an eye on this, thanks to all who download <3
Any picture titled as 'Beta' is the newest Version, Without a title is the Alpha download.
I Recommend you install the Ultra Performance ENB and my custom .ini file if you want the results to look the same
(I think the first 2 screenshots were before i fixed the lighting with the ini file so that might be what the game looks like without the ini file depending on your settings already though of course)
author: BleakKhajiit
